TopicTitle: KW (or other parts pack mods) Question

Articles.Content:
Huge fan of KW Rocketry mod. But The thread about it is closed, so I can't post in there.

So I have a few questions.

Is it stable for the latest release of KSP? The thread is ambiguous on this (as much as I can tell), so I'm not sure what to do.

Is there another part pack that rivals KW? If the devs aren't supporting it anymore (and I understand why, with constant updates to the game, keeping a mod current is a daunting task), is there another that adds the same/similar parts to the game? The clean cut Apollo-esque look to the parts was a huge bonus for me.

I could mod a lot of the stock parts myself, and I have made minor tweaks to various parts, but replicating the entire pack is beyond my capabilities.

And if they aren't supporting it, what are the chances that the game devs incorporate it, parts from it, or similar parts into the stock game?

Thanks!

KW is working on 20.2, as I have it (and love it). Don't know why people got their feathers ruffled in the dev thread.

The newest version is on the spaceport here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-1-kw-rocketry-overhauled/

Thank you sir!

Knowing my favorite mod is still in play makes my day!
In answer to your second question, the AIES pack is quite good, really nicely detailed parts/sat pods and surface attaching engines.

AIES is a good pack, but more geared smaller launch vehicles and payloads. Also has no where near the options as KW has(it still needs fleashed out a bit imo...still damn fine looking parts for sure). Honestly the only mod I would consider in direct competition with KW is the NovaPunch pack. Other than those 3 most other launch vehicle mods are somewhat restrictive in how usable they are (mainly packs that replicate actual launch vehicles, Bobcats soviet pack is a great example of this).

The main reason people got all ruffled in KW thread is that the mod was updated to work in post 0.20, but not as optimized as it could be (honestly I think a lot of that was due to Ba9's remarks about KW in the B9 thread just after their 0.20 release). And then a couple people started demanding that Winston post whats going on with the mod, so thread locked due to jackassery haha.
